definition: Vega, brightest star in constellation Lyra 天琴星座

sentences.english: Well heeled: The stars were back in their stilettos and glamorous frocks .
sentences.chinese: 女星们个个身着漂亮的连衣裙和高跟鞋。

sentences.english: I’m pretty sure even the women of leisure in Hollywood have stress.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定即使是好莱坞的女星们也会有压力。

sentences.english: She is well-loved, even if she’s not the most traditionally beautiful starlet.
sentences.chinese: 她非常受欢迎，即使她不算传统意义上的最美女星。

sentences.english: The movie actress had six revolving-door husbands.
sentences.chinese: 那位女星很快就“换”了六个丈夫。

sentences.english: Want to have an Oscar-winning actress be your  personal assistant?
sentences.chinese: 想不想让奥斯卡获奖女星当你的私人助理？

sentences.english: Magazine covers, said a suicide actress to her boyfriend forced marriages.
sentences.chinese: 杂志封面，说某女星自杀，向男朋友逼婚。

sentences.english: Can a great dramatic actress also be a martial-arts star?
sentences.chinese: 个优秀的影视演员能同时也是功夫女星吗？

sentences.english: I looked great!" says the Ghost Whisperer actress.
Hold onto love that is what I do now that I've found you.
sentences.chinese: 胡慧中是我很喜欢的台湾女星。

sentences.english: Did you know which famous star that was forced out by Songmeiling in those years?
sentences.chinese: 知道谁是当年被宋美龄封杀的好莱坞中国女星吗？

sentences.english: This time female celebrity Haruka Ayase successfully won first place.
sentences.chinese: 这次由女星绫濑遥顺利夺下榜首。

sentences.english: During their divorce, the actress argued for rights to keep Flossie .
sentences.chinese: 当这对夫妻离异时，这位女星赢得弗洛西领养权。

sentences.english: Hughes was also known as a womaniser, especially with Hollywood film stars.
sentences.chinese: 晓治当年被指纵欲，特别是与荷里活电影女星的绯闻。

sentences.english: His wife of nearly 30 years is Taiwanese former actress Lin Feng-Jiao, or Joan.
sentences.chinese: 他30年的妻子是台湾前女星林枫娇，或琼。

sentences.english: The Weibo account with the largest fan base belongs to a Chinese actress called Yao Chen.
sentences.chinese: 新浪微博上拥有最多粉丝的账户属于中国女星姚晨。

sentences.english: It's rumored recently that he's in love with 20-year-old Hong Kong singer and actress Isabella Leung.
sentences.chinese: 最近有传他与20岁的香港女星梁洛施相恋。

definition: role of vivacious young female in Chinese opera
Gong Li (1965-), PRC female film star
Li Bingbing (1973-), PRC film actress and pop star
Lin Chi-ling (1974-), Taiwanese model and actress
Michele Monique Reis (1970-) actress, model and former Miss Hong Kong & Miss Chinese International
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
